author: Simon Difford
description: Back in the 1940s, in his The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks, David Embury said of this drink, "One of a few cocktails using grapefruit juice. Not particularly good but not too bad."
name: Blinker
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
